dialogue.introduction: Guten Tag ... ah, my mistake... sorry, please call me "hachi".
dialogue.library_intro: I made it to Germany as the second submarine sent on the transoceanic voyage. Then, I received a U-boat. This operation was carried out 5 times, but because of mines and other events, I was the only one who was able to successfully complete the return trip... yeah, I really hate mines!
dialogue.secretary2: Hmm, if it's easier for you, call me "Hacchan". Yes.
dialogue.secretary3: Ah! ...You've surprised me, touching me all of a sudden and making these loud noises.
dialogue.secretaryidle: I think... I'd like to read a new book now...
dialogue.wedding: Admiral? Hacchan wants to read a new book... oh, things I like outside of books? Hmm~ I'd like to try Stollen sometime, yeah? Ah, but it's a Christmas confectionery. Eh? Mamiya will bake it? Today's a special day!? Wow, I'm so happy♪
dialogue.show_players_score: A report for the Admiral. Let's see...
dialogue.equipment2: That's right. I think upgrading is essential...
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: May I entrust you with the servicing?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Looks like repairs will take some time... I wonder if I can take a lot of books with me into the docks?
dialogue.docking_complete: It seems that repairs have been completed
dialogue.ship_construction: It seems a new ship has been constructed.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: I won't lose to anyone on long voyages!
dialogue.battle_start: I don't really like fighting.... but I've no other choice!
dialogue.air_battle: I'll keep resisting even if I surface! I'll shower you with these 20mm machine guns I brought back!
dialogue.night_battle: Come on! Torpedoes loaded... oh... not yet...
dialogue.night_attack: I'll keep resisting even if I surface! I'll shower you with these 20mm machine guns I brought back!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I'll keep resisting even if I surface! I'll shower you with these 20mm machine guns I brought back!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I'll keep resisting even if I surface! I'll shower you with these 20mm machine guns I brought back!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I'll keep resisting even if I surface! I'll shower you with these 20mm machine guns I brought back!
dialogue.mvp: Oh my? Did Hacchan do it? Well then, as a reward, I'd like to eat Stollen.
dialogue.minor_damaged1: It's glossy black... and its eyes are glaring...
dialogue.minor_damaged2: The hydraulic pressure is rising...! Ah, leaking...!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I have to surface, and re-position myself...
dialogue.sunk: I always knew I'd sink, some day... Admiral... everybody... I'm glad that I met you all...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Nevertheless, during Christmas there's still Sto- eh? Admiral baked this for me? Really? Danke! Hacchan is excited!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Admiral, Hacchan will help you do some cleaning. First, the Admiral's desk's drawer... eh? You're going to clean it yourself? Um, I see.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Please take care of the submarine fleet and me this year, yes!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun...? No, I'll pass on that....Admiral? Why the sad face...? Ah, okay. I'm throwing it now... Hyah...

hourly.0200: 0200. Still fighting even at this time?
hourly.0300: 0300. If you keep going now, you wont last through tomorrow. Admiral?
hourly.0400: 0400... Aa, sorry, I nodded off there...
hourly.0500: 0500. Do you like German bread? I was just thinking about it, so I'll go make some.
hourly.0600: 0600. I'll have some German bread ready for after breakfast.
hourly.0800: Eight!... no wait, 0800. The roggenmischbrot, freshly baked!
hourly.0900: 0900. How was the German bread, Admiral?... Too sour? Admiral... I don't get you...
hourly.1000: 1000. It's time to refocus on my reading!
hourly.1100: 1100. Once, I gave Hibiki some freshly baked bread, and she was so happy! What a good kid...!
hourly.1300: 1300. Let's keep on reading, shall I?
hourly.1400: It feels refreshing to not be submerged.
hourly.1500: 1500. I'm a bit distracted, so I can't focus on reading....
hourly.1600: 1600. Admiral, what do you usually do around this time?
hourly.1700: 1700. What should I make for dinner..?
hourly.1800: 1800. I really like the atmosphere the sun setting over the sea creates.
hourly.1900: 1900. I want to try something other than swimsuits... like the uniform everyone is wearing... maybe?
hourly.2000: 8-8! Wait, 2000. Admiral, here and some ham, cheese and potato. Eat up!
hourly.2100: 2100. Admiral, are you feeling better now?
hourly.2200: 2200. Admiral is playing Kancolle! I am reading! Eheh~
hourly.2300: It's 2300. It's getting late, isn't it. I'm a bit tired...
